page.title: 10A Saturday With My Family.
page.content: At half past seven we get up and have breakfast and then get dressed. When we are ready my brother ,sister and I go out in the garden and play on our bikes or play in our den. At one o'clock my mum calls us in for a snack.At two o'clock I play with my friend,Marion,and we go for a walk to the workman's hut.We climb on top and slide down the sides which is good fun.After that we go and play at my house. When we get tired of playing in the garden we go for a bike ride.At half five it is time for me to go home for tea. After tea I play Monopoly with my mum and dad.I go to bed about ten p.m., about an hour later than usual.
